name: vaultcontroller
description: Smart Contract to implement a Project Balancer
author: Jordi Baylina

scripts.travistest: cd solcover && node ./runCoveredTests.js && cd .. && eslint test
scripts.solcoverinstall: git clone http://github.com/adriamb/solcover.git && cd solcover && git checkout 4e22facad7cfe2be5545cfcbdee16094678e9601 && npm install
scripts.travis: npm run installdeps && npm run travistest && ./node_modules/.bin/codecov
scripts.installdeps: npm install && git clone http://github.com/adriamb/solcover.git && cd solcover && git checkout 4e22facad7cfe2be5545cfcbdee16094678e9601 && npm install
